titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on formulated product KROVAR IDF.
To reduce temporarily the duty on formulated product KROVAR IDF.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2008, the duty on formulated product KROVAR I DF containing active ingredients: [5-bromo-3- sec-butyl-6- methyluracil] (a.k.a. bromacil) and [3-(3,4- dichlorophenyl) 1,1-dimethylurea] (a.k.a. diuron) and application adjuvants.
